name: my-portfolio-website
description: A portfolio of all the projects I will create during my time as a student at Microverse.  We will be developing the website over a series of checkpoints and then adding our future projects: - Project 1: Setup and mobile version skeleton ✅ - Project 2: Mobile version ✅ - Project 3: Contact form ✅ - Project 4: Desktop version ✅ - Project 5: Application deploy ✅ - Project 6: Evaluate accessibility  - Project 7: Mobile menu  - Project 8: Details modal  - Project 9: Validate contact form  - Project 10: Preserve data in the browser
